name: CreateScanningGroup
description:
Create a new scanning group in Datadog.

This tool creates a new scanning group in the Datadog sensitive data scanner. It allows for the configuration relationship to be included but does not support creating rules simultaneously. The new group is added last in the configuration order.

parameters.name: scanning_group_configuration
parameters.description: JSON object specifying the attributes and relationships of the scanning group, including name, filter, and enabled status.

is_enabled.description: Whether or not the group is enabled.

product_list.description: List of products the scanning group applies.

product.description: Datadog product onto which Sensitive Data Scanner can be activated.

rate.description: Rate at which data in product type will be scanned, as a percentage.

samplings.description: List of sampling rates per product type.

attributes.description: Attributes of the Sensitive Data Scanner group.

configuration.description: A Sensitive Data Scanner configuration data.

data.description: Rules included in the group. The order is important.
Data related to the creation of a group.

meta.description: Meta payload containing information about the API.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.
